citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.dfo-mpo.cnodc-cndoc_a3084e37-dfab-4fde-898b-a2964e6210d4\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Government of Canada; Fisheries and Oceans Canada; Canadian National Oceanographic Data Centre\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2015\", \"02\", \"01\"]}], \"abstract\": \"La simulation r\u00e9trospective GROWFine est une suite de la simulation MSC50 Atlantic. Elle vise le territoire nord-est de l'oc\u00e9an Pacifique. Cette simulation est archiv\u00e9e aux trois heures pendant la p\u00e9riode 1980-2015, et elle comprend les effets des eaux peu profondes et les cyclones tropicaux.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Simulation r\u00e9trospective des vents et des vagues MSC50 (Pacifique)\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-dfo-mpo-cnodc-cndoc_a3084e37-dfab-4fde-898b-a2964e6210d4?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.dfo-mpo.cnodc-cndoc_a3084e37-dfab-4fde-898b-a2964e6210d4\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Government of Canada; Fisheries and Oceans Canada; Canadian National Oceanographic Data Centre\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2015\", \"02\", \"01\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The GROW-Fine hindcast is a follow-on to the MSC50 Atlantic hindcast which addresses the Northeast Pacific Ocean. The hindcast is archived 3-hourly for the period 1980-2015 and includes shallow water effects and tropical cyclones.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"MSC50 Wind and Wave Climate Hindcast (Pacific)\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-dfo-mpo-cnodc-cndoc_a3084e37-dfab-4fde-898b-a2964e6210d4?local=en\"}]

  <gco:CharacterString>The GROW-Fine hindcast is a follow-on to the MSC50 Atlantic hindcast which addresses the Northeast Pacific Ocean. The hindcast is archived 3-hourly for the period 1980-2015 and includes shallow water effects and tropical cyclones.</gco:CharacterString>
  <lan:PT_FreeText>
    <lan:textGroup>
      <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">La simulation rétrospective GROWFine est une suite de la simulation MSC50 Atlantic. Elle vise le territoire nord-est de l'océan Pacifique. Cette simulation est archivée aux trois heures pendant la période 1980-2015, et elle comprend les effets des eaux peu profondes et les cyclones tropicaux.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
    </lan:textGroup>
  </lan:PT_FreeText>
</mri:abstract>

name: ca-dfo-mpo-cnodc-cndoc_a3084e37-dfab-4fde-898b-a2964e6210d4
notes: The GROW-Fine hindcast is a follow-on to the MSC50 Atlantic hindcast which addresses the Northeast Pacific Ocean. The hindcast is archived 3-hourly for the period 1980-2015 and includes shallow water effects and tropical cyclones.

notes_translated.en: The GROW-Fine hindcast is a follow-on to the MSC50 Atlantic hindcast which addresses the Northeast Pacific Ocean. The hindcast is archived 3-hourly for the period 1980-2015 and includes shallow water effects and tropical cyclones.
notes_translated.fr: La simulation rétrospective GROWFine est une suite de la simulation MSC50 Atlantic. Elle vise le territoire nord-est de l'océan Pacifique. Cette simulation est archivée aux trois heures pendant la période 1980-2015, et elle comprend les effets des eaux peu profondes et les cyclones tropicaux.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: MSC50 Wind and Wave Climate Hindcast (Pacific)

title_translated.fr: Simulation rétrospective des vents et des vagues MSC50 (Pacifique)
